commit_list.message:
Convert specs to RSpec 2.99.2 syntax with Transpec

This conversion is done by Transpec 3.2.2 with the following command:
    transpec --keep=its --keep=have_items --no-parens-matcher-arg --keep=oneliner

* 398 conversions
    from: obj.should
      to: expect(obj).to

* 42 conversions
    from: obj.should_receive(:message)
      to: expect(obj).to receive(:message)

* 30 conversions
    from: obj.should_not
      to: expect(obj).not_to

* 23 conversions
    from: =~ [1, 2]
      to: match_array([1, 2])

* 15 conversions
    from: == expected
      to: eq(expected)

* 13 conversions
    from: =~ /pattern/
      to: match(/pattern/)

* 6 conversions
    from: lambda { }.should
      to: expect { }.to

* 3 conversions
    from: Klass.any_instance.should_receive(:message)
      to: expect_any_instance_of(Klass).to receive(:message)

* 3 conversions
    from: obj.should_not_receive(:message)
      to: expect(obj).not_to receive(:message)

* 2 conversions
    from: be_true
      to: be_truthy

* 1 conversion
    from: >= expected
      to: be >= expected

* 1 conversion
    from: be_false
      to: be_falsey

* 1 conversion
    from: pending 'is an example' { }
      to: skip 'is an example' { }

For more details: https://github.com/yujinakayama/transpec#supported-conversions

Signed-off-by: Dane Jensen <dane.jensen@gmail.com>
